sentences.sContent: So you want your very own hovercraft?
sentences.sContent_eng: So you want your very own hovercraft?
sentences.sCn: 你想拥有自己的气垫船么？

sentences.sContent: What advantages has the hovercraft over the aeroplane?
sentences.sContent_eng: What advantages has the hovercraft over the aeroplane?
sentences.sCn: 气垫船有什么优于飞机的地方？

sentences.sContent: Since that time, various types of hovercraft have appeared and taken up regular service.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since that time, various types of hovercraft have appeared and taken up regular service.
sentences.sCn: 从那以后，各种各样的气垫船出现了，并开始了定期航行服务。

trans.tranOther: a vehicle that travels just above the surface of land or water, travelling on a strong current of air that the engines produce beneath it
